data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 6,398 believers in the state of Kamwenge to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kamwenge, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Kamwenge. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Kamwenge to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 6,398 believers in Kamwenge.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, 1.5% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Kamwenge, Uganda.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 3 new simple churches in the state of Kamwenge, Uganda. Place a simple church in every community of the 19,300 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 6,398 believers in Kamwenge against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

location.name: Kamwenge
location.people_groups_list: Kalenjin, Pokot, Nyang'i, Plains Bira, Amba, Kaliko
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kalenjin, Pokot (134,000), Nyang'i (18,000), Plains Bira (2,000), Amba (54,000), Kaliko (13,000)
